title: Ticket #6340: The '*' security specifier is IPv4-specific.
description: The second thing that condor_netaddr::match() checks is to see if the netaddr and the proposed match have the same address type. That'd be fine, if the condor_netaddr::from_string() code didn't assign '*' to the IPv4 address type.
